title: Long-form video is the next big thing for young audiences
description: It’s often said that the digital era has bestowed young people’s brains with short attention spans and wired them to seek the thrill of the next pixelated dopamine hit. When it comes to journalism, it’s true that young people have gravitated towards short-form video for their news, with TikTok and Instagram becoming major sources. News...
